text: The Texas Legislature is the state legislature of Texas. It is made up of two parts: the Texas House of Representatives (lower house) and the Texas Senate (upper house). The House has 150 members and the Senate has 31 members. The legislature meets at the Texas State Capitol in Austin, Texas. As of 2022, both houses are controlled by the Republicans, with Dan Patrick as President of the Senate and Dade Phelan as Speaker of the House. Both are Republicans. ==Makeup== ===Senate=== Affiliation Members Republican 19 Democratic 12 Total 31 ===House of Representatives=== Affiliation Members Republican 86 Democratic 64 Total 150 ==References== Category:Texas Legislature Category:Organizations based in Texas Category:1836 establishments in the United States Category:1830s establishments in Texas
title: Texas Legislature
